location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Charles Edwards, Accountant, Residency Persian Gulf, Bushire to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter thanking Pelly for arranging for Dr William Henry Colvill to be present at Bushire for the monthly treasury examination; Mr Lucas being sent to Shiraz to meet with Pelly in order to sign various entertainment vouchers and to complete a power of attorney form from the Bank of Bombay for the Bushire School Fund; Pelly's Arab horses and how they are being cared for; Hajee Ahmed applying for retirement and pension owing to illness and old age.
